title: Project Planning
description: Define project scope, requirements, and timeline

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture and components for the FeedbackToGrowthConverter system, including the following key components: 1) Feedback Ingestion Module 2) Feedback Processing Module 3) Personal Development Plan Generation Module 4) User Interface Module 5) Data Storage Module. Consider scalability, maintainability, modularity, and performance optimizations. Provide a high-level architecture diagram and detailed descriptions of each component's responsibilities and interactions.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing user feedback, personal development plans, and related data

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for feedback input and plan viewing

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the core logic for feedback processing and plan generation

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate frontend and backend components, and perform thorough testing

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the system

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment and deploy the system

title: Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals
